FLTDF.summary: Flow Traders N.V. operates as a financial technology-enabled liquidity provider in financial products in Europe, the Americas, and Asia. The company uses its proprietary technology platform to quote bid and ask prices in thousands of exchange traded products (ETP), as well as similar financial products. It also provides liquidity in ETPs off-exchange to institutional counterparties, including banks, asset managers, pension funds, insurance companies, family offices, hedge funds, and others. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
